description: Jake Porter is a boyish, brown-haired real estate agent looking to close a deal with his client, Jason Vario, a chiseled hunk with a bubble butt! He shows off the house while cleverly displaying his assets and Jason definitely takes notice. Jake gets the feeling he’s about to close more than one deal and leads Jason into the master bedroom where he finally gets to seal it with a good ass rimming and anal pumping.
title: Always Be Closing Part 1
